vague_description: The sandwich company needs to determine the optimal number of dine-in places and food-trucks to open such that they meet their daily sandwich production requirements while staying within their available workforce limit.
detailed_description: A sandwich company can open two types of stores, a dine-in place and a food-truck. A dine-in place can make \var{DineInProd} sandwiches per day and requires \var{DineInEmp} employees to operate. A food-truck can make \var{FoodTruckProd} sandwiches per day and requires \var{FoodTruckEmp} employees to operate. The company must make at least \var{MinSandProd} sandwiches per day but they only have available \var{TotalEmp} employees. How many of each type of store should the company open to minimize the total number of stores?
target_objective: Minimize the total number of dine-in places and food-trucks
target_constraints: Number of dine-in places is an integer
Number of food-trucks is an integer
Number of dine-in places is non-negative
Dine-in places and food-trucks collectively make at least MinSandProd sandwiches per day
Total number of employees used by dine-in places and food-trucks does not exceed TotalEmp
target_parameters: Sandwich production per day by a dine-in place
Employees needed to operate a dine-in place
Sandwich production per day by a food-truck
Employees needed to operate a food-truck
Minimum number of sandwiches to be made per day

parameters: Number of dine-in places to open

pred_objective.objective: Maximize daily sandwich production and minimize operational costs while staying within the workforce limit.

constraints: The total sandwich production from both dine-in places and food-trucks must meet or exceed the daily sandwich production requirements.
The total number of workers allocated to both dine-in places and food-trucks must not exceed the available workforce limit.

parameters: Number of dine-in places to open

pred_objective.objective: Maximize the daily sandwich production while utilizing the available workforce efficiently.

constraints: The total number of sandwiches produced by both dine-in places and food-trucks must meet or exceed the daily sandwich production requirement.
The combined workforce used for both dine-in places and food-trucks must not exceed the available workforce limit.

pred_objective.objective: The objective is to determine the optimal number of dine-in places and food-trucks to meet daily sandwich production requirements within workforce constraints.

constraints: The daily sandwich production requirements must be met.
The number of dine-in places and food-trucks must remain within the available workforce limit.

pred_objective.objective: The objective is to determine the optimal allocation of resources to meet daily sandwich production requirements while staying within workforce limits.

constraints: The daily sandwich production must meet the target number of sandwiches.
The solution must stay within the available workforce limit.

pred_objective.objective: To determine the optimal number of dine-in places and food-trucks to open that satisfy the daily sandwich production requirements without exceeding the available workforce capacity.

constraints: The total number of sandwiches produced by dine-in places and food-trucks should meet or exceed the daily production requirements.
The number of workers assigned to both dine-in places and food-trucks must not exceed the available workforce limit.

pred_objective.objective: maximize the total sandwich production subject to workforce constraints.

constraints: The total number of sandwiches produced by dine-in places and food-trucks together must meet or exceed the daily sandwich production requirements.
The total workforce utilized by dine-in places and food-trucks together must not exceed the available workforce limit.

pred_objective.objective: Maximize the number of sandwiches produced within the workforce constraints by optimally determining the number of dine-in places and food-trucks to open.

constraints: The total number of dine-in places and food-trucks opened must not exceed the available workforce limit.
The total sandwich production from the dine-in places and food-trucks must meet the daily sandwich production requirements.

pred_objective.objective: To determine the optimal number of dine-in places and food-trucks to open in order to meet the daily sandwich production requirements while staying within the available workforce limit.

constraints: Sum of dine-in places and food-trucks must meet daily sandwich production requirements.
Workforce used by dine-in places and food-trucks must be within available workforce limit.

parameters: Number of dine-in places to open

pred_objective.objective: Maximize sandwich production while adhering to workforce constraints.

constraints: The total number of dine-in places and food-trucks must be sufficient to meet the daily sandwich production requirements.
The total workforce assigned to both the dine-in places and food-trucks must not exceed the available workforce limit.

Daily sandwich production requirements for food-trucks

pred_objective.objective: To determine the optimal number of dine-in places and food-trucks to open such that the company meets its daily sandwich production requirements while staying within the limits of their available workforce.

constraints: The total number of sandwiches produced by both dine-in places and food-trucks must meet or exceed a certain daily requirement that varies by location.
The total workforce employed across both dine-in places and food-trucks must not exceed the available workforce limit.

parameters: Number of dine-in places to open
Daily sandwich production requirement for dine-in places
Daily sandwich production requirement for food-trucks

pred_objective.objective: To determine the optimal number of dine-in places and food-trucks to open in order to meet variable daily sandwich production requirements for each location type, while staying within the available workforce limit.

constraints: The sum of sandwiches produced by all dine-in places and food-trucks must meet or exceed the overall daily sandwich production requirement.
The sandwich production for each location type (dine-in places and food-trucks) varies linearly with the number of those locations.
The total workforce used by the sum of all dine-in places and food-trucks must not exceed the available workforce limit.

parameters: Daily sandwich production requirement per location

pred_objective.objective: To determine the optimal number of dine-in places and food-trucks to open in order to meet daily sandwich production requirements while adhering to workforce constraints.

constraints: The number of dine-in places and food trucks must meet a certain daily sandwich production requirement for each location type.
The number of dine-in places and food trucks must not exceed the available workforce limit.
The daily sandwich production requirement for each location type varies linearly with the number of locations of that type.

pred_objective.objective: Maximize sandwich production while adhering to workforce constraints by determining the optimal allocation of resources between dine-in places and food trucks.

constraints: The combined sandwich production from both dine-in places and food-trucks must meet or exceed the daily sandwich production requirements.
The number of staff allocated to both dine-in places and food-trucks must not exceed the available workforce limit.

pred_objective.objective: Minimize the total number of stores opened while meeting production and employee constraints.

constraints: Each dine-in place and food-truck has a different daily sandwich production capacity.
There is a daily sandwich production requirement that must be met.
There is a limit on the total available workforce which must not be exceeded.
Each type of store requires a specific number of employees.
The solution must minimize the total number of stores opened.

Constraints: Meet daily sandwich production requirements.
Constraints: Stay within available workforce limit.
All constraints must be satisfied simultaneously.
